body.bibl: Nelpuraparambil, Philip. “Syriac Identity: Integration and Relations with the Society in India and in the Diaspora.” In Identity and Witness: Syriac Christians of the Middle East and India between Homeland and Global Presence, edited by Dietmar W. Winkler and Andreas Schmoller, 69–80. Pro Oriente Studies in the Syriac Tradition 5. Piscataway, New Jersey: Gorgias Press, 2023.
